turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. How's it going?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm wonderful, I'd like to order four small pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. what did you want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take the first one. I'll have a California-style pizza with artichokes added and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and for the others?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a Chicago style pizza with extra cheese with

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra jalape単os and pineapple added.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and for the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take another with barbecue sauce, sausage, jalape単os, bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What types of cheese does Bella Luna have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all the types your heart desires.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have feta cheese added to that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll also and that will be all for that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and for the last one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the last pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the most popular pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'd have to say that'd be meat lovers or bbq chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. I'll do the Supreme Pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so the order is as follows. 4 small pizzas, 1 california style with artichokes and extra cheese, 1 chicago style with pineapple, extra cheese and extra jalapenos, 1 with bbq sauce, sausage, jalapenos, bacon, extra feta cheese, and 1 supreme pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, extra cheese on all of them, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $72.49 is the total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, that's fantastic. You sure should, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 34 minutes. did you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all. I'm so excited about this pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm glad to have placed the order for you and help with your excitement.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Thanks. You're the best as always.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy!
